page.title: 12ORGANISATIONS IN HOLYWELL
page.content: In addition to the Fron Park complex the{various Churches}in the town have their organisations for children and adults.There are{WI groups}meeting in English and Welsh and a{Townswomens {Guild.}The St.John's building is used for{Red Cross}meetings and scout and cub activities.{Territorial army and {Air Training Cadets}meet in the Drill Hall.The town has a{football team}and within the area a cricket pitch and {golf club.}Holywell has a number of Inns where darts and dominoes can be enjoyed and recently there has been a growth in the number of{Pub Quiz Teams testing each others general knowledge. Outdoor activities include a{rambling {club,many Nature Trails}to be enjoyed and facilities for fishing.The local {Rotarians}organise many charity events and these are held on the football field during each year.
